name: Geordi Taylor
headline: The strategic bridge between business objectives and technical execution.
bio: With a decade-long foundation in Global Energy Management and Sustainability, I leverage a deep understanding of regulated utility markets to drive technical transformation in privacy and security architecture. From orchestrating enterprise-wide data privacy frameworks to leading vulnerability management initiatives across mission-critical infrastructure â€” I bring cross-functional strategic leadership to the world's most complex systems.
narrativeIntro: Privacy Engineering: Orchestrating and scaling data privacy frameworks across a diverse portfolio of enterprise systems, bridging the gap between legacy infrastructure and modern privacy-by-design principles. My career spans co-founding a clean energy startup, publishing energy policy research, modernizing fintech platforms, and now leading privacy and security transformation at one of the world's largest regulated utilities.

development.context: Immersive study in Germany focused on global economics and international business.
Professional education in data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy) and backend database management.

languages.context: Advanced professional working proficiency; Minor in French from Pace University.
Native fluency; leveraging deep cultural and linguistic roots to navigate diverse international environments.
Basic conversational proficiency developed during immersion at the University of Mannheim.
